thread.title: Volquez to start World Series opener for Royals
thread.title_full: Volquez to start World Series opener for Royals - KCTV5

author: cbs8
title: Volquez to start World Series opener for Royals
text:
By DAVE SKRETTA
AP Sports Writer KANSAS CITY, Mo. (AP) - Edinson Volquez will start the World Series opener for Kansas City, followed by Johnny Cueto in Game 2.
Yordano Ventura will start Game 3 at Citi Field on Friday, followed by Chris Young in Game 4.
New York's rotation opens with Matt Harvey, and Jacob deGrom, Noah Syndergaard and Steven Matz follow.
Volquez was 13-9 with a 3.55 ERA during the regular season and 1-2 with a 4.32 ERA during three starts in the playoffs.
